ModMetaData.name: RJWNLPatch
ModMetaData.author: Zephyr
ModMetaData.description:
Add RJW OTY Patch to NL Compatible Body Load order : - rimnudeworld - OTY_NUDE - OTHER OTY_PATCH - This mod - NL Compatible Body
Note : Due to female base body have valouptus size, RIP micro and small breast Log: v 0.4 - Add OTY Texture for Kurin v 0.3 - Add OTY Texture for Ancient Race v 0.2 - Add OTY Texture for NL Compatible Body 2 v 0.1 - Init Project - Apply OTY Texture, editing and modify several OTY Texture for NL Compatible Offset Purpose
Todo: - Some texture need to be redrawn - Modify some apparel
